pr_title: ImageField: Stop parsing images using Regex

timeline.message:
Parse Image HTML using HTML Parser

We were previously using Regex, which is a bad thing.

Fixes #5874

Do not preview invalid images

Previously, we were trying to decode images which were not valid.

There was no point in doing this.

replies.bodyText: Any way I can contribute to an auto-review for this? It'll happen again, and It's a bad habit that I don't need to waste your time with
replies.author: david-allison-1

replies.bodyText: might just be a config thing you can change? https://www.jetbrains.com/help/idea/nullable-notnull-configuration.html#
replies.author: mikehardy

timeline.message:
Ensure we don't try to preview collection.media

An empty path was concatenated with nothing, which returned
collection.media, which was also a valid file.

Ensure we don't try to preview collection.media

An empty path was concatenated with nothing, which returned
collection.media, which was also a valid file.

timeline.bodyText: Issue found: Avoid reassigning parameters such as 'bmp'
timeline.author: timrae
